A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie was pretty much a series of very unlikely or stupid actions/events/logic that panned out which made the plot boring.
Lacked a lot of originality in many places. 
Too much attention to characters no one cares about. 
Movie had a difficult time keeping track of the number of people who die and are still alive. 

Visuals were great. 

Probably the worst Star Wars since Phantom Menace.
